snippet: Japan’s public broadcaster said that Katsuya Takahashi, a former member of the Aum Shinrikyo cult, was arrested Friday on suspicion of murder in the 1995 subway gas attack.
abstract: Investigators in Japan arrest Katsuya Takahashi, a former member of the Aum Shinrikyo cult, in Tokyo on suspicion of murder in the 1995 subway nerve-gas poisoning attack that killed 13 people; arrest comes two weeks after Naoko Kikuchi, a suspected accomplice, was taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s public broadcaster said that Katsuya Takahashi, a former member of the Aum Shinrikyo cult, was arrested Friday on suspicion of murder in the 1995 subway gas attack.

headline.seo: 1995 Tokyo Subway Attack Suspect Said to Be Caught
headline.main: Suspect in ’95 Tokyo Attack Is Said to Be Caught
headline.print_headline: Suspect in ’95 Tokyo Attack Is Said to Be Caught
